presentationColumns.name: Unit Price
presentationColumns.description: This is the unit price on Transfer Order Lines.

presentationColumns.name: Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated value of Transfer Order Lines amount.

presentationColumns.name: Lines Tax
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated value of Transfer Orders Lines tax.

presentationColumns.name: Total Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as total line amount inclusive of all tax for the Requested Quantity.

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as total line amount inclusive of all tax for the Shipped Quantity.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Shipped Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Received Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as total line amount inclusive of all tax for the Received Quantity.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Received Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Delivered Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as total line amount inclusive of all tax for the Delivered Quantity.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Delivered Lines Amount
